nimble:ShrinkRayGun.NAME: Shrink Ray Gun
nimble:ShrinkRayGun.FLAVOR: I'll be harder to hit when smaller - brilliant!
DESCRIPTIONS: Shrinks you during combat and converts HP into agility, which currently grants a #y
% chance to dodge attacks and gain buffer at start of turn if you have none. Activation and HP loss reduce agility, healing restores it.
